shortdesc.ph: Agora supports reporting and analyzing customized messages.

section.p: This function is in the beta stage with a free trial. The ability provided in its beta test version is reporting a maximum of 10 message pieces within 6 seconds, with each message piece not exceeding 256 bytes and each string not exceeding 100 bytes. To try out this function, contact support@agora.io and discuss the format of customized messages with us.
